figures.name: Alexander the Great
figures.shortDescription: King of Macedon who created one of the largest empires of the ancient world

figures.name: Aristotle
figures.shortDescription: Greek philosopher and scientist, teacher of Alexander the Great

figures.name: Julius Caesar
figures.shortDescription: Roman statesman and military general who played a critical role in the transformation of the Roman Republic

figures.name: Leonardo da Vinci
figures.shortDescription: Italian polymath of the Renaissance, widely considered one of the greatest painters of all time
